title: Jamie's Story: Gay Young Adult Romance
description: Aside from being an amateur ghost hunter and one of the only gay kids in his small West Virginia town, Jamie leads a fairly normal life. Boring, even. All that changes with the appearance of Cephas and Luke, real monster hunters with terrible secrets. Jamie soon finds himself in the middle of a world he always hoped existed, but he may not be prepared for the consequences when fantasy becomes reality.
author: D.M. Quillin
